top_comments.comment: I'm from the south and I know not to get between a mamma bear and her cubs! Evidently some city democrats have never been taught this! Mamma bear 101 is in session America! Let's go Brandon!!!

comments_since_last_sample.body: The federal government should not be involved in public education, it should be a state and local issue. Nor should there be a national teacher's union wielding power over teachers and boards nationwide.
Quisha King has a gorgeous smile when she speaks. Beautiful woman.
